Create a home gym: Use household items like chairs, tables, and cans of soup to create a makeshift gym. For example, you can use a chair as a bench for push-ups, squats, and dips.
Outdoor activities: Take advantage of nature by going for hikes, biking, or swimming in of sporting equipment.
Yoga and meditation: Practice yoga and meditation to improve flexibility, strength, and mental health.
DIY workout videos: Use online workout videos to learn new exercises and techniques.
Dance and music: Dance to your favorite music or take a dance class to get your heart rate and burn calories.
